anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.description: Humans fight for survival against man-eating giants called Titans.

anime.title: Demon Slayer
anime.description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to save his sister and defeat Muzan Kibutsuji.

anime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
anime.description: Yuji Itadori eats a cursed finger and joins Jujutsu High to fight curses.

anime.title: One Piece
anime.description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew search for the legendary treasure One Piece.

anime.title: Death Note
anime.description: Light Yagami finds a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it.

anime.title: Solo Leveling (Season 2)
anime.description: In a world where hunters fight monsters in dungeons, Sung Jin-Woo, the weakest hunter, gains the unique ability to level up infinitely. As he grows stronger, he faces tougher enemies and uncovers secrets about the dungeons and his own power.

anime.title: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto (The Apothecary’s Monologue) Season 2
anime.description: A court apothecary unravels mysteries while navigating palace intrigues.

anime.title: Takopi’s Original Sin
anime.description: A dark story exploring trauma and morality through a strange alien creature.

anime.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End
anime.description: An elf mage reflects on her journey and seeks to understand humanity after her companions’ deaths.

anime.title: The Apothecary Diaries
anime.description: A clever young girl solves court mysteries through her apothecary skills.
